283442.「あら？ この商品で 覚えられることは\n すでに 覚えていらっしゃるようですよ:
Oh, no? It seems that you have already learned

283443.「あら？ この中に 今のお客様では\n ご利用いただけないものが ございますね。:
Oh? I see that some of these products are not available for current customers. Please install the additional package "Sleeping Hero
and Guiding Ally online" before using this product.

283444.「あら？ この商品は\n 港町レンドア南の 取りよせ商チャガナさんでも\n 取り:
Oh? Collection Merchant Chagana in South Port Lendor also carries this item. We have a record of its availability in our customer's
records, so you can get a great deal if you buy from Chagana!

283445.「あら？ お客様の郵便箱の 空きが足りないので\n この商品が 全て 入りきらな:
Oh, no? It looks like your mailbox is too small to hold all of these items. We apologize for the inconvenience, but please try again
after you have reorganized your mailbox.

283446.「あら？ この中に 今のお客様ですと\n ご利用できないものが ございますね。\:
Oh? Some of these items are not available to current customers. We apologize for the inconvenience, but this item is only
available after you complete the quest "The Crown of Wisdom".

283448.「あら？ お客様のクローバーバッグに\n 期限切れの 同じアイテムが\n 入って:
Oh, no? It looks like you have an expired item in your Clover Bag. You can only have one of this item, so please throw away the expired
item before replacing it.

283449.「あら？ この商品の １か月の交換上限を\n 超えてしまうので 交換できないよう:
Oops? Looks like I can't exchange this item

283450.「あら？ この商品は\n まだ交換できないようです。すみませんが\n 購入可能に:

283451.「あら？ お客様のクローバーバッグに\n 期限が切れていない 同じアイテムが\n:
What? You have the same item in your clover bag that hasn't expired yet. You can only have one of these items, so you'll have to
wait until it expires before you can purchase it again.

283452.「ＤＱＸショップでは ほかの店とは一味ちがう\n ドレスアップおしゃれ装備や ド:
The DQX Shop offers a wide variety of fashionable dress-up equipment, Dolboard form modification prisms, and more. The Free Pass
items are special fashionable equipment that can be reacquired as many times as you like. Items with a clover mark in the item's details
in Fairy Mirror and other shops are available in the DQX Shop. Please note that items from the DQX Shop cannot be sold or traded on the
bazaar.

283453.「港町レンドアの２階にも ショップ店員がいて\n その店員シロツメからの 依頼を:
There's also a Shop Clerk on the second floor of Port Lendor's train station. Her name's Shinotsume, and you'll get Shop Points
for completing her quest.
You can also get Shop Points from the clerk who visits Megistris City every month. The official website will announce it.
Using the DQX Shop on the official Adventurer's Square website, you can purchase items using a variety of different currencies.

283454.「こちらは ドラゴンクエストＸの\n 公式サイト『目覚めし冒険者の広場』にある\:
This is a DQX store on the official Dragon QuestX website "Awakening Adventurer's Square". You can exchange your Premium Gold or
Shop Points to get the items on sale. We have a wide variety of fashionable equipment and useful items for your adventures, so please
take advantage of it!

283488.「どの説明を聞きますか？\n<select_se_off>\nＤＱＸショップ出張:
Which explanation do you listen to?
<select_se_off>
About DQX Shop

<select_end>

<%sL_GOODS>?

288193.「ＤＱＸショップ本店では 別の通貨を使って\n アイテム商品を買えることができま:
At the DQX Shop main store you can buy item items using different currency. It is in the official site "Awakening Adventurer's Square".
You can use different currency there to accumulate experience in shopping. You can also earn ranks and get great products by
accumulating this experience.

288194.「今まで ＤＱＸショップで購入した アイテムの\n 履歴は 公式サイト『目覚めし:
You can check the history of all the items you've purchased from the DQX Shop by going to the DQX Shop's main store on the official
website, Awakened Adventurer's Square. If you want to reacquire a free pass type item, you can also go to the DQX Shop's main menu and
select "Get Free Pass".
